# M: geom_m...


## geom_mark_circle

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(ggforce)
ggplot(elephants, aes(y = Height, x=Weight)) +
  geom_mark_circle(aes(fill = Category, label = Category),
                   con.cap = 0) 
```

With geom_point

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(ggforce)
ggplot(elephants, aes(y = Height, x=Weight)) +
  geom_mark_circle(aes(fill = Category, label = Category),
                   con.cap = 0) +
  geom_point()
```
